summary: THERE WAS A PROBLEM WITH THE VEHICLES TRANSMISSION.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER AT LEAST SIX TIMES WHILE UNDER WARRANTY.  THE  DEALER STATED THAT NOTHING WAS WRONG AND MADE NO RECORD OF CHECKING THE VEHICLE.  CURRENTLY THE  VEHICLE IS OUT OF WARRANTY AND THE TRANSMISSION IS STILL HAVING PROBLEMS.   *AK    *NLM
